string.value: #p2111003# made a present for #p2111005#. What, he's not human, but he can perform alchemy? \n\nAnyway, #p2111003# made #t4031693#. I didn't think the present seemed girly enough, but in the world of alchemy, this might be the norm... I better give this to #b#p2111005##k right now.
#p2111005# was very ecstatic to receive this gift. She must be really close with #p2111003#.

Ah, good thing you are here. I have produced a present for #p2111005#. Take a look at it. It's #t4031693#.

#i4031693##t4031693# 

 #p2111005# is very interested in alchemy, so she'll be very happy with it. Now that the present is ready, can you help me once more by delivering it to her?
Thank you so much. Once she finds out you lent a helping hand in making this, #p2111005# will be that much happier. Now please give this to her.
Oh why? Are you too shy to give it to her? Don't worry about that one bit. Remember, it can also be your present to her.
Hmm? Do you need me for something? Ehh? This is... wow! It's #t4031693#! This is awesome! Hey, but... are you really giving to me?
Wow, it really is a present from #p2111003#! Yes! I really wanted one, you know. How did he know? And you helped him make this, too... this is so awesome. Thank you so much! I am so happy right now.
Hehe... I better Say thanks to #p2111003# too!
You haven't gone to see #b#p2111005##k yet? I am sure she'll be ecstatic to see this. Please deliver that to her.
Hmm? Do you need me for something?
You lost #t4031693#? Oh no... good thing I made a spare. Please give this to #p2111005#.
